text: Ricardo Carbajal Oteo (born October 17, 1968 in Mexico City) is a Mexican football manager and former player. On 21 July 2020, Carbajal was presented as the manager of Liga de Balompié Mexicano side Industriales Naucalpan F.C.. ==External links== * ==References== Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Mexican footballers Category:Footballers from Mexico City Category:Querétaro F.C. footballers Category:Cruz Azul footballers Category:Atlante F.C. footballers Category:C.F. title: Ricardo Carbajal
